data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.

Goal! Miami go level at 1-1 through Matias Pellegrini in Harrison.
Lewis Morgan instrumental with a fine assist.

Miami's Dylan Nealis gets in a shot on goal at Red Bull Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.

In the minute 89, Aaron Long returns to the field for New York after picking up a slight injury.
